title: Complaint filed against two French-Israeli soldiers accused of war crimes in Gaza
subhead: The French complaint was lodged by a number of associations defending human rights and supporting Palestinians. It is based primarily on a report by an independent Palestinian journalist.

title: In Switzerland, an F-35 fighter jet deal has turned into a national scandal
subhead: The purchase of 36 next-generation American fighter jets will cost far more than the six billion Swiss francs initially announced in 2022. They might also be delivered under-equipped in terms of weaponry.

title: Israel limits entry of baby formula in Gaza as infants die of hunger
subhead: While waiting to enter Gaza on a medical aid mission, an American doctor watched Israeli security forces confiscate the cans of powdered baby formula packed in his luggage. The vital product is desperately lacking in the Palestinian enclave, where about 50 children have died of hunger since March.

title: Israel is destroying the subsistence of Gaza's population, from agriculture to fishing
subhead: More than 95% of farmland has been damaged or lies in areas inaccessible to farmers, as the Palestinian enclave suffers from famine.

title: In France, workplaces confront resurgence in machoism
subhead: Everyday sexism persists among employees and companies continue to perpetuate values tied to male dominance. Yet company leadership has not shifted away from diversity policies, unlike some of their American counterparts.
